DOC.brief_title: Osteopathic Treatment Adult Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: To compare impact osteopathic treatment placebo osteopathic treatment usual care pain 6 month adult patient cystic fibrosis localize chest , cervical , dorsal neck back .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis cystic fibrosis ( positive sweat test / presence 2 disease cause mutation CFTR gene Age > 18 year Patient chronic chest , neck back pain Written Informed Consent health insurance Exclusion criterion : regular followup osteopathic physician previous 3 month patient await lung transplantation history lung transplantation pregnancy understand disorder prevent patient apply study participation another clinical interventional study protocol
